description:
Fast text expander for Windows & macOS. Save email templates, AI prompts & code snippets.

PhraseVault is an easy-to-use text expander and snippet manager that helps you stop retyping the same emails and text blocks. Store and insert frequently used phrases, email templates, AI prompts, and code snippets across all your apps.
Press Ctrl+. (or Cmd+. on macOS), search with fuzzy matching, and paste with Enter. Works in any app that accepts text - Word, Gmail, VS Code, ChatGPT, and more.
Source-available, no telemetry, works offline. Your data never leaves your device.
